name: Theodoros Mastori
story: Theodoros Mastori grew up in Greece and joined the Greek military at age 18. He served for 8 years before joining BLUFOR as part of their NATO support. He is now a Corporal and an expert in heavy weapons, particularly the M240 machine gun. Theodoros is devoted to his wife and two children, and often thinks of them while on missions. He takes his duties very seriously and is always ready to do his part to ensure the mission's success.
